TEXT.TITLE: HEALTH MANAGEMENT <HMA> LIMITS LIABILITY
TEXT.BODY: Health Management Associates Inc said stockholders approved amendments to its restated certificate of incorporation limiting the personal liability of directors for monetary damages except in certain circumstances. The company said the amendments also authorized the indemnification, or protection, of directors, officers and employees for claims made against them in their official capacity. It also said stockholders approved a stock option plan. Reuter
